channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump officials to announce plan to boost coal output
item.description: The U.S. will announce policies to encourage coal output, as the Trump administration seeks to reverse the decline of the fuel's use.

item.title: Trump threatens mass firings of federal workers if government shutdown isn't averted, NBC News reports
item.description: The White House last week told federal agencies to begin preparing for mass firings if Congress does not pass a deal to avert a government shutdown.

item.title: U.S. stock futures higher after a losing week as possible shutdown looms
Economic calendar: Three Fed speeches and pending-home-sales data on agenda
GSK is replacing its CEO with an insider and shares are flying
Nasdaq powers higher as tech-stock investors look past government-shutdown fears
Morgan Stanley slashes rating on Novo Nordisk, says Alzheimer trial will fail
Police remain on scene at burned out Michigan church after shooting and fire leave 4 dead, 8 wounded
item.description: A former Marine opened fire during a crowded service at a Michigan church, killing at least four people, then set the building ablaze.

item.title: GOP leaders say Obamacare tax credit fight can wait until after government shutdown is averted
item.description: President Donald Trump is poised to meet Monday with the top four congressional leaders, as the funding deadline nears.

item.title: Eric Adams drops out of New York City mayoral race
item.description: President Donald Trump has suggested that NYC Mayor Eric Adams and Curtis Sliwa, the Republican nominee, should both drop out of the race.
